name: Ariel
text: ...Yes, I am. How long has it been?

name: Android Mechanic
text: 4 days and 3 nights. You're lucky you're awake at all. That explosion out in the field did a number on your body.

name: Android Mechanic
text: We don't currently have the parts to repair your model so we hooked you up to a life support module, but this is only a temporary fix.

name: Ariel
text: I suppose that's why I can't move. Do you know when the spare parts will be in?

name: Android Mechanic
text: About that... We don't think that we'll be getting those parts any time soon, or at all really.

name: Android Mechanic
text: Well, you're an experimental model that was built several decades ago. Your original purpose was to test if human emotions would develop inside of completely

name: Android Mechanic
text: artificial parts. As you can telll, the experiment was a success, but I'm afraid they've taken the data they've learnt from you and used it to create new models

name: Ariel
text: Oh...I see. Well surely there's a reason you kept me alive when I'm in such a state. Do you believe there's a way I can recover?

name: Android Mechanic
text: Possibly. We can attempt a data transfer into another model but with how your data is stored most of it would be lost in the process. You have human emotions

name: Android Mechanic
text: so I know you'll have your own preferences. Would you rather lose most of your memories and get a new body? Or would you rather live the rest of your life in

name: Android Mechanic
text: your current body which is destined to die?

name: Android Mechanic
text: That's fine. I know it's a load question. You don't have to answer right now but you don't have much more time to decide. I'll let you think about it while

name: Android Mechanic
text: you play a game I've prepared on your system. I'll be back in an hour.
